channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: In 2026, Every Company Will Need A CIRM Strategy
item.description: The New Battle in Cybersecurity Is Response

item.title: Meet The Ants That Practice Medicine. Hint: They Discovered Their Own Form Of Antibiotics
item.description: Research shows that some ants have learned how to treat their wounds, revealing one of the clearest examples of medical behavior outside humans.

item.title: Xbox Sales Are Down 70% Year-Over-Year With PS5 Down 40%
item.description: Xbox, PlayStation and even Nintendo are suffering from very low console sales due to price hikes, economic conditions and more.

item.title: ‘Fallout’ Season 2 Just Set Three Rotten Tomatoes Records
item.description: Fallout season 2 has hit and has already set three different Rotten Tomatoes records for its genre after just one episode.

item.title: iOS 26.2: Apple Abruptly Cancels Key iOS 18.7.3 Update For Most iPhones
item.description: If you’ve been waiting for iOS 18.7.3 to reach your iPhone, it looks like it’s been scrapped. Here’s what to know.

item.title: The thing about chess
item.description: In a typical tournament, you don’t score any extra points for winning with the fewest number of moves. Quickly isn’t the point.

item.title: Filtering ourselves
item.description: We don’t use the same language or ideas with an in-law that we do with our bar buddies. When the internet was young, people often chose to filter them...

item.title: Better than the cheap alternative
item.description: Frozen pizza changed the game for many pizzerias. If you couldn’t offer something better than what I had in my freezer, what do I need you for? If the...

item.title: Taken for granted
item.description: It’s an odd term, worth a look. We don’t notice that the tree we planted a few years ago thrives just a bit more each day. We don’t notice that the ma...

item.title: Where did kiwi come from?
